name: Infernoculus
description:
Since the dawn of times forces of good and evil fought a neverending battle. 
The fate of the world was at stake, while millions of souls clashed in the bloody massacre. Whole continents were cracked and torn apart by might and magic....

Anyway, mhm. That was a long time ago. 
Now we just kick the giant eyeball around. Ah, the joys of a civilized era!

So welcome! Welcome to the Netherworld's major Infernoculus League! Come for the sins, stay for the thrill of victory!"

FEATURES:

Infernoculus is a tactical turn-based soccer simulator where you can kick the giant eyeball into the enemy face. The eyeball might be on fire. Just sayin!

Prepare for the:

  • Several different heroes!
  • Cool abilities!
  • Ultimate combos!
  • Lava pits!
  • Fire!
  • FIRE! OH MY GOD EVERYTHING IS ON FIRE!
  • Healing facekick! 
    • while on fire!
  • 1 player mode! 2 players mode! 0 players mode!
  • No plot whatsoever!
  • And if you are lucky, you might even score a goal! 
CONTROLS:

Game is controlled by mouse. Click on the cell to walk there. Click on the ball while near it to enter the kick mode. 
Pass the ball to your allies and hit the enemy gates. The gameplay should be pretty straightforward, but there's a help button if you need it. Also, hover on abilities to get some extra info.
